Package org.sd.cluster.job

Interface Summary
BatchMaker Interface for creating a batch of work units.
BatchUtil.BatchLineProcessor  
Job A job is a type of message handled by a cluster node.
JobDataDirectory Encapsulation of a job data directory.
KeyStrategy Strategy for generating a key from a unit of work.
PartitionFunction Strategy for choosing a destination node to receive data.
PublishableWorkFactory A publishable work factory to be used in jobs.
UnitOfWork Marker interface to encapsulate a unit of work to perform.
WorkBatch.WorkUnitComparer  
WorkFactory Interface for iterating over units of work.
 

Class Summary
AbstractBatchWorkServer A job for serving work to other jobs across a cluster.
AbstractCountingJob A job whose processing is monitored/controlled through a UnitCounter instance.
AbstractJob A job is a type of message handled by a cluster node.
AbstractJobDataDirectory Abstract implementation of the job data directory interface.
AbstractPartitionFunction Abstract implementation of the partition function interface for cluster tasks.
AbstractUnitOfWork Abstract unit of work implementation to keep track of counts.
AbstractWorkFactory Abstract implementation of the work factory interface.
AcquireJobIdMessage A message to get a new local id for a job from a node.
AllNodesJobOutputIterator Utility class for iterating over all nodes' cluster job output files on a machine.
BasicWorkFactory A basic work factory that allows units to be added dynamically.
BatchUtil Utilities for working with batches.
BatchWorkServer A job for serving work to other jobs across a cluster.
ClientWorkFactory A work factory that gets its work from a WorkServer.
ClusterizingJobDataDirectory A job data directory for accessing file data by absolute path to be transferred as input to another job.
CountingJob A job that counts, intended to be used as a reference implementation and for demonstrating and/or testing job management.
DataTransferWorkServer A job for serving work to other jobs across a cluster.
DirectoryBatchMaker A batch maker that creates a string unit of work that is the path to each (deep) directory contained under a path.
EmptyJob
GetGlobalJobIdMessage A message to get the global job id for a local job id on a node.
GetJobsMessage A message to get information about all jobs on a cluster node.
GetLocalJobIdMessage A message to get the local jobID for a job.
GlobalJobId An identifier for a job that is distributed across multiple nodes.
GovernableJob A job that wraps a properties-based governable instance.
InputJobDataDirectory A job data directory for accessing input to the job.
IntegerUnitOfWork A unit of work that holds a integer.
JobCommandMessage A message for sending a command to a job.
JobDataFile Encapsulation of a job data file in the cluster.
JobLogAnalyzer Utility to analyze a job log.
JobManager Singleton to manage all jobs for a ClusterNode.
JobOutputIterator Utility class for iterating over a node's cluster job output files.
JobOutputProcessor Base class for processing mounted cache job output.
JobPipeline A JobPipeline is a controller that encapsulates defining and executing a sequence of jobs across the cluster.
JobProbeData Container for probed job data.
JobProbeResponse A response containing data from probing a job.
JobToJobMessage A job command message between two nodes' jobs.
JobUtil Common job utilities.
LocalJobId An identifier for a job in reference to a single node.
ModuloPartitionFunction A partition function that returns the key modulo numPartitions.
OldAbstractJob A job is a type of message handled by a cluster node.
OutputJobDataDirectory A job data directory for accessing output from a job (to be transferred as input to another job).
PartitionWorkFactory A work factory suitable for direct use in jobs that manages multiple partitioned files.
PathBatch Utility to track a batch of domain paths in memory for processing.
PostOffice Utility to collect and send e-mail messages.
PostOfficeMessage A message containing e-mail information that is sent to a post office for collection and distribution by e-mail.
ReadingWorkFactory A work factory implementation that reads input work units from a file.
RedistributorWorkServer A work server for redistributing work evenly across machines once work has already been assigned (unevenly).
ResultsConcatenationJob A job that concatenates the final output from other jobs into a single aggregation file.
ResultsMerger Abstract base class for merging resutls from two job runs.
ResultsProcessorJob A job for processing the results of a mounted cache job.
RoundRobinPartitionFunction A partition function that returns each partition in 'round robin' order.
SimpleWorkFactory A partition work factory that always walks through each unit of work in its batches.
SimpleWorkPool A simple thread pool for processing data in multiple threads.
SteadyStateJob Job implementation that waits for and queues up work to be done.
SteadyStateJobStarter Utility class to kick off a steady state job.
StreamingWorkFactory A work factory implementation that streams input work units through to output work units when released.
StringUnitOfWork A unit of work that holds a string.
TrackingWorkFactory A partition work factory that tracks units of work that have been dealt and released through a StreamingWorkFactory.
TriggerFindingJob Job output processor for finding trigger domains.
WorkBatch Container for a batch of work.
WorkBatch.EndsWithAnyComparer  
WorkBatch.EndsWithComparer  
WorkBatchDeduper Utility to remove duplicate domains from a crawl_map, keeping the first.
WorkBatchDistributor Utility to distribute work batches from lines in a file.
WorkBatchSplitter Utility to split work batches at key units.
WorkBuffer A buffer around a work factory for looking for specific work.
WorkCombiner One-off utility to read in multiple batches of the form /mnt/.../domain, keeping only the last version of a domain.
WorkPathInterleaver Utility to create a work batch from lines in a file, interleaving data sprayed across multiple nodes.
WorkPool A thread pool for handling units of work in multiple threads.
WorkServer A job for serving work to other jobs across a cluster.
WorkServerClientJob Abstract implementation of a job that will be a client to a work server.
WorkServerClientWithOutputJob Base class for work server client jobs with output.
WorkServerOutputFixer Utility to remove "no sitemap found" domains from work server output.
WorkServerOutputToInputConverter Utility to convert work server output back into input for re-using caches.
 

Enum Summary
JobCommand Enumeration of job commands to be handled through the JobManager.
JobStatus Enumeration of job status types.
JobUtil.Direction Enumeration for data direction from a node's running job's perspective.
WorkStatus Enumeration of types to indicate the status of a unit of work.
